segments.text: My eyes keep returning to that rickety two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching himself out to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed wide, and it looks like it's tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any sudden movement, and he could lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be a terrible fall onto a wet kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the cookies flying everywhere, the plate shattering!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing too close, she could get knocked over too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much courage these kids have for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the prize, he doesn't seem to feel the stool shift.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he can steady himself and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing feels like it's happening in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising that no one else in the house seems to hear this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secret mission is fraught with danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
